snippet: A woman stabbed Denver’s fire chief Tuesday afternoon after jumping into his vehicle near the department’s headquarters, the authorities said.
abstract: Denver police arrest Marlene Zacevich-Rodriguez on suspicion of aggravated assault after she jumped into Fire Chief Eric Tade's vehicle and stabbed him; Tade has been hospitalized in fair condition.
lead_paragraph: A woman stabbed Denver’s fire chief Tuesday afternoon after jumping into his vehicle near the department’s headquarters, the authorities said.

headline.main: Colorado: Denver Fire Chief Injured in Stabbing
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Denver Fire Chief Injured in Stabbing
